title.narrative: Medical supervision, follow-up and supervision of projects to treat wounded and injured Yemenis in the private sector in Yemen for three hospitals.

description.narrative: * Quality and performance control and the extent of satisfaction of the wounded and injured from the services provided to them through the implementing partner.

Follow-up and control of the treatment of wounded and injured Yemenis in the private sector in Yemen, and ensure that all treatment and diagnostic services, operations, rehabilitation and follow-up are provided in accordance with the treatment plan for each wounded and injured separately.
